import "./Post.css"; import MoreVertIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MoreVert"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; import { useState } from "react"; function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false); return (
u.id === post?.userId)[0].profilePicture} alt="" className="postProfileImg" /> {Users.filter((u) => u.id === post?.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{like} people like this
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
